title: Is romance dead? Does it only exists in fairy tales? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, romance is not dead. It’s rare, of course, but the reason why it’s so hard to spot it is because most romantic people reserve the romances to themselves, not to social media. It’s something private and intimate that romantic people wouldn’t like to share it to the world… Or…. More romantically, wouldn’t even remember to share it, because their minds were only thinking about their person of interest.
